#summary UNIGAMES, a unicycle game

= Introduction =

The idea is to make a sort of olympics games oriented to the unicycle.
The selected games could be the ones that are played in the "unicons"
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UNICON

A _retro_ look is desireble.

= Details =
  * Language: Python
  * Other libraries: pygame, pygext, pyode
